description: A long waist apron made of cotton.

variants.description: It's colored white, like the ones commonly used by chefs, professional or otherwise.
It's colored black, commonly used by chefs working in the night or who just want to look cool.
It's a royal blue color, commonly used by supermarket workers around the world.
It's colored neon pink, commonly used by women or men who like pink.
It has a floral design and colored yellow, perfect for cooking outdoors.
It has a camouflage pattern, perfect for chefs who want to hide in the wild.
It's colored black with a skull and roses pattern.  Makes you feel more fashionable just by wearing it.
It's colored white with black frilly decorations, commonly used with a maid dress or alone for nighttime activities.
It has a jet-black color with dark red decorations, perfect for cosplay or an adventurous gourmet.
It's colored white with black frilly decorations, commonly used with a maid dress or alone for nighttime activities.
It's colored white with black frilly decorations, commonly used with a maid dress or alone for nighttime activities.

description: An apron made of leather.
An apron made of plastic, provides good protection against accidental chemical splashes.
An apron made of Kevlar fabric.
A short black and yellow dress, reminiscent of a bee.  It includes bee wings, a hood, and a pair of antennae.
A professional-looking wool blazer.

variants.description: This one is bright blue and styled to cosplay Boston-Chan.

description: A light and breezy cheerleader dress.  It's blue and white with the word "Cheers" printed at the top.
A short red cheerleader tank top.  It has the word "Cheers" printed at the top.

An oddly balanced long-sleeved shirt with a thin, breathable torso and thicker arms more appropriate for a jacket.  The arms are covered in a camouflage pattern and have two shoulder pockets.  It has a pocket for your pen!
A long cotton dress.
A long sleeved button-down shirt made from denim.
//: This is for 12 oz denim shirt, which I found to be average

snippet_category.text: A long sleeved button-down blue shirt made from denim.
A long sleeved button-down shirt made from denim, dyed black.
A long sleeved button-down cowboy wash shirt made from denim.

description: A button-down shirt with long sleeves.  Looks professional!
A white button-down shirt with long sleeves and a pocket on the front.  Looks professional!
A beautiful white wedding dress.  What good will it be now?
A brightly-colored vest designed to keep you upright and floating in water.
A flotation vest made of inflated animal skins.
A luxurious evening gown.  It accentuates your curves, or lack thereof.
A short top made from cotton.
A sweatshirt with a hood and a "kangaroo pocket" in the front for storage.
A sweatshirt with a hood, cropped to expose the stomach.
A lightweight, breathable shirt made from synthetic fabric, designed for athletic performance and team identification.

variants.description: A lightweight, breathable shirt made from synthetic fabric, designed for athletic performance and team identification.
This one is printed with the name and logo of the <sports_team>

description: A skin-tight spandex garment, covering the body from the groin to the shoulders.  With its deep scoop-cut back and high waist cuts, this garment is perfect for showcasing your physique on the stage.
A long-sleeved cotton shirt.
The French maid dress, blue with a frilly white apron.
The French maid dress, black with a frilly white apron.  This version is much lighter and shorter than normal.
A short off-white dress printed to look like the tattered wrappings of an ancient mummy.  Very easy to move in, but it doesn't offer any type of protection.

description.str: A short black and red sleeved dress with oriental dragon motifs printed on it.  Perfect for the kunoichi that wants a little more style.
A short black and red dress with oriental dragon motifs printed on it.  Perfect for the kunoichi that wants a little more style.

description: A short-sleeved cotton shirt, slightly thicker than a t-shirt.
A light blue button down shirt with a couple of pockets in front and the US postal service logo embroidered on it.

variants.description: A light blue button down shirt with a couple of pockets in front and the US postal service logo embroidered on it.
A tan button-down shirt with long sleeves.
A charcoal button-down shirt with long sleeves.  Has a patch with the word "SWAT" affixed on one shoulder.

description.//NOLINT(cata-text-style): The dot after Mrs is not a period
description.str: A sleeved red dress with white faux fur trim.  For when you want to be Mrs. Claus on Christmas, or perhaps Santa going clubbing.

description: A long red dress with full sleeves and white faux fur trim.  A dress for a queen of the north pole.

description.//NOLINT(cata-text-style): The dot after Mrs is not a period
description.str: A short red dress with white faux fur trim.  Looks like something Mrs. Claus might wear on Christmas night.

description: A crude and bulky short-sleeved shirt woven from grass.  Definitely not the most comfortable thing to wear.

description.str: A long black and red dress with full sleeves, a collar, and embroidery reminiscent of a vampire duchess.
A short red dress made in gothic lolita fashion.

description: A red and black gown with full sleeves.  It has a gothic style and looks pretty luxurious.
A light and breezy cotton dress.
A warm wool sweater.
A thick cotton shirt.
A gray work t-shirt with a small front pocket.

A light-blue work t-shirt with a small front pocket.

description: A short-sleeved cotton shirt.

description: A short-sleeved cotton shirt, cropped to expose the stomach.

description: A shirt with four tassels worn by observant Jews in deference to Deuteronomy 22:12, which commands the wearing of fringes on the corner of one's garments.
A traditional Buddhist shirt, covering most of the upper body, but not the arms.
A vest made from thick leather.

description.str: A dress with full sleeves and pointed cuts at the edges.  Perfect for Halloween.

description: A long dress with sleeves, typical of a witch.  It includes a pouch for storing potions and other magical items.

description.str: A short dress typically used by witches.

description: A hooded wool shirt with a kangaroo pocket in the front.

A bunny suit, still shiny despite the time it's likely spent in storage, or worse, on a corpse.  While not resembling a bunny without its accompanying tail and ears, it was a recognizable piece of clothing often found in clubs or in playboy magazines.
